challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: You should create a new p element at the end of your .daily-value element.
Your new p element should have the text Total Fat 8g 10%.
One span element should wrap the text Total Fat.
The span element around Total Fat should have the class set to bold.
The span element around 10% should have the class set to bold.
A span element should have the text Total Fat 8g.

description: After your last .divider element, create a p element and give it the text Total Fat 8g 10%. Wrap the text Total Fat in a span element with the class of bold. Wrap the text 10% in another span element with the class of bold. Finally, nest the Total Fat span element and the text 8g in an additional span element for alignment.
